articles.title: World Conference to Be Held to Support Korea's Independent and Peaceful Reunification
articles.content:
British Preparatory Committee Formed 
    Pyongyang, August 3 (KCNA) -- A British preparatory committee for celebrating the 60th anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea was inaugurated with due ceremony in London on July 27.
 Harpal Brar, chairman of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of Britain (Marxist-Leninist), who is chairman of the British Friendship Society with Korea was elected chairman of the preparatory committee and Dermot Hudson, chairman of the British Association for the Study of Songun Politics, vice-chairman of the committee at the ceremony.    
 The committee set the days from July 27 to October 10 as a period of celebrations and decided to organize various functions in the period.

articles.title: One More GI Assault against S. Korean Civilian Reported
Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Work Celebrated
articles.content:
One More GI Assault against S. Korean Civilian Reported 
    Pyongyang, August 3 (KCNA) -- One more GI assault was committed against a south Korean civilian, MBC of south Korea reported.
 A sergeant belonging to the Camp Stanley of the U.S. forces base in Uijongbu took issue with a local passer-by surnamed Ri in front of a building in Mapho District of Seoul at the dawn of July 30 and struck his head with a beer jug, seriously wounding him.

articles.content:
Greetings to Tunisian FM
    Pyongyang, August 3 (KCNA) -- Foreign Minister Paek Nam Sun sent a message of greetings to his Tunisian counterpart Abdelbaki el Hermassi to mark the 30th anniversary of the establishment of diplomatic ties between the DPRK and Tunisia.
 Expressing the belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries will favorably develop in the interests of the two peoples in the future, too, the message sincerely wished him greater success in his work.

articles.title: Congratulations to Saudi Arabian King
articles.content:
Message of Sympathy to Saudi Crown Prince
    Pyongyang, August 3 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, Tuesday sent a message of sympathy to Saudi Crown Prince Abdullah Bin Abdul-Aziz over the death of King Fahd Bin Abdul-Aziz from illness.
 The message expressed deep condolences to him and through him to the Saudi royal house and people and the family of the deceased.

articles.content:
Congratulations to Saudi Arabian King
    Pyongyang, August 3 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, today sent a message of congratulations to Abdullah Bin Abdul-Aziz upon his accession to the throne of Saudi Arabia.
 The message sincerely wished the king great success in his responsible work and good health and happiness.
